Text:
I saw the screener for this in town. This is one of the worst remakes I've seen and that's saying something. Smiling CGI mouthed vampires. The old script was spit on, pissed on, shat upon, then made into this travesty of a "vampire" movie.
Just my heartfelt opinion. I'm sure the popcorn movie crowd will like this as it is tasteless, humorless, and no where near the original. 
Oh well.
thats crazy it has collin farrow in it and I'm dying to see it I can't wait til someone puts this on here!!!!
